data.eml:eml: A synoptic review of the ants of California (Hymenoptera: Formicidae).

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ward, P. S. (2005): A synoptic review of the ants of California (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). Zootaxa 936: 1-68, URL: http://antbase.org/ants/publications/21008/21008.pdf
